items.summary: Update the centralized Field Service Group color mapping so Group 3 uses the darker green hex color #0B6623, and ensure this new color is reflected everywhere Field Service Group colors are consumed (including Field Service Groups main page colored bars/group text/icons and Field Service Group profile pages heading text/colored bars/Record Visit button).

On the Publishers page table, update the Overseer and Assistant badges so their styling (background + text + hover behavior) matches the badge styling used for Overseer and Assistant on the Field Service Group profile page.
